user.title: Azure Face API Configuration
user.description: Configure your Azure Face API connection. You'll need an Azure Cognitive Services Face API key and endpoint.

data.endpoint: Custom Endpoint URL (only if Custom is selected)

data_description.region: Select your Azure region or choose Custom to specify a custom endpoint.
data_description.endpoint: Enter your custom Azure Face API endpoint URL if you selected Custom region.
data_description.api_key: Enter your Azure Face API subscription key.

person_group.title: Person Group Configuration
person_group.description: Configure or create a person group for face recognition. Person groups are used to organize and identify people.

data_description.create_new_group: Check this to create a new person group, or uncheck to use an existing one.
data_description.person_group_id: Select from existing person groups in your Azure Face API account.
data_description.person_group_id_manual: Enter a unique identifier for the new person group (letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores only).
data_description.group_name: Enter a friendly name for the person group.
data_description.group_description: Optionally enter a description for the person group.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Azure Face API. Please check your endpoint and network connection.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key. Please check your Azure Face API credentials and make sure the key is active.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred during setup. Please try again.
error.missing_custom_endpoint: Custom endpoint URL is required when Custom region is selected.
error.missing_person_group_id: Person Group ID is required when creating a new group.
error.missing_group_name: Group name is required when creating a new person group.
error.invalid_person_group_id: Person Group ID must contain only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
error.cannot_create_group: Failed to create person group. Please check that the ID is unique and doesn't already exist.

abort.already_configured: Azure Face is already configured for this endpoint and person group combination.

init.title: Azure Face Options
init.description: Configure advanced options for Azure Face integration.

data_description.confidence_threshold: Minimum confidence level required for face identification (0.0 = least strict, 1.0 = most strict).
data_description.detection_model: Azure Face detection model to use. Detection 03 is recommended for most use cases.
data_description.recognition_model: Azure Face recognition model to use. Recognition 04 offers the best accuracy.
